_comment: Zenodo Electron Diffraction Uploader - Application Configuration
_description: This file contains default settings for application behavior, not Zenodo metadata
_usage: Edit these values to customize default application behavior for your research group

api_settings._comment_sandbox: Set to true for testing uploads, false for production
api_settings._comment_base_url: Zenodo API base URLs (usually don't need to change)
api_settings._comment_token: API token is entered in the application, not stored here

application_settings._comment_create_zip: Automatically create ZIP archives for directories
application_settings._comment_checksums: Compute MD5 checksums for uploaded files

file_settings._comment_max_size: Maximum file size in GB (0 = no limit)
file_settings._comment_zip_name: Default name for created ZIP archives

gui_settings._comment_remember_size: Remember last window size and position

validation_settings._comment_strict_mode: Strict validation (more checks, may reject valid data)
validation_settings._comment_warn_missing: Show warnings for recommended but not required fields
